original_text: Or what man is there of you, whom if his son ask bread, will he give him a stone?
korean_text: 너희 중에 누가 아들이 떡을 달라 하는데 돌을 주며

sentences.original_text: Or what man is there of you
sentences.korean_translation: 또 너희 중에 어떤 사람이 있느냐

sentences.original_text: whom if his son ask bread
will he give him a stone?
